jeca.bmp

Bitmap module a layer above ALLEGRO_BITMAP*

class Bmp;
Title:
Bmp - to do with bitmaps (images made up of pixels)

terminolagy(sp): bitmap = ALLEGRO_BITMAP* and bmp is Bmp

static ALLEGRO_BITMAP* loadBitmap(string fileName);
Load bitmap picture

Throws:
exceptions if file name not exist or get a null

static Bmp getBmpSlice(Bmp src, real sx, real sy, real w, real h, real dx, real dy, int flags = 0);
get a slice

Note:
sets target bitmap

ALLEGRO_BITMAP* bitmap();
get bitmap like: 
	   al_draw_bitmap( chimney(), 0, 0 ); // or
	   al_draw_bitmap( chimney.bitmap, 0, 0 );


this(string fileName);
Constructor:
loads using passed in file name

this(int w, int h, in string name = "unititled");
Constuctor:
just creates bitmap with given sizes
